articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: IND vs AUS 2nd ODI Vishakhapatnam weather report: Will rain force washout - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In a piece of bad news for cricket fans, rain is expected to play spoilsport and could also lead to a possible washout in the upcoming 2nd ODI between India and Australia, in Vishakapatnam. | Cricket
articles.content: In fine form and with the 50-over World Cup in sight, India take on Australia in the second ODI, at the YS Raja Reddy Cricket Stadium in Vishakapatnam. With KL Rahul also bouncing back to form, Rahul… [+2450 chars]
